Reviews.Title: i really like it
Reviews.Author: maricel
Reviews.Content: i bought 2 of this its easy to use and cheap you can send your pictures right after you take.i will surely recommend this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP CCD Image Sensor - ISO 100 to 12800
3.0" 230k-Dot LCD - Wi-Fi Direct, Email
25-125mm f/2.5 5x Optical Zoom Lens - 2D Panorama, Smart Auto, Smart Movie
Capture HD 720/30p Video - Face, Blink and Smile Detection
Direct LINK, Mobile Link, Remote VF - microSD/microSDHC Memory Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F 16.2MP & F2.5 Lens with WI-FI Ready Smart Digital Camera Red + 4GB MicroSD HC Memory Card + Camera Case + Accessory Kit
